p: By comparing the metatranscriptomic datasets between the two groups, we identified several bacterial genera, including Corynebacterium, Neisseria, and Haemophilus, that were differentially expressed. For example, Corynebacterium had a higher relative abundance of mapped RNA sequence reads in group 1, while Neisseria (primarily N. meningitidis) and Haemophilus (H. parainfluenza) had a higher relative abundance of mapped reads in group 2 (Fig. 2a).
